title: What REALLY Happened In Uvalde? (Ep 1778)
description:
In this episode, I address the disturbing new revelations about the police response to the tragedy in Uvalde, Texas. 

News Picks:


Police response tactics changed after the Columbine attack. 


The CBO report calls into question Joe Biden’s ridiculous “deficit reduction” claims.


San Francisco drops 'chief' from school job titles over cultural sensitivities.

Democratic Senators call on messaging apps WhatsApp, Telegram, and Signal to address "misinformation.”

  • San Francisco drops 'chief' from school job titles over cultural sensitivities.
  • Democratic Senators call on messaging apps WhatsApp, Telegram, and Signal to address "misinformation.”
